column1: skanDezu niruDyamAnezu ekasmin= eva kzaNe tulA daNxa nAma unnAma nyAyena eva OpapattyA aMSikAH skanDAH yaTA karma AkzepataH upajAyante evam ca bimba pratibimba mudrA pratimudrA nyAyena pratItyasamutpAdaH siDyati tulA daNxa nAma unnAma nyAyena tu yat vijQAnam saMniviSate iti uktam tat bAla loka boDa anuroDena samAna kAle eva Bava pratisaMDiH iti taTA samAnena samAna kAlam lokasya duHKam ca suKa udayam ca hartum ca kartum ca sadA astu SaktiH tamaH prakASam ca yaTA eva BAnoH  iti na tu punar pratItyasamutpAda svarUpa vicakzaNAnAm evam vaktum yujyate sAhacarya Adi tvam eka kzaNe tulA daNxa nAmA unnAma dRzwAntena iti janma unmuKam na sat idam yadi jAyamAnaMnASa unmuKam sat api nAma niruDyamAnam izwam tadA kaTam idam tulayA samAnam kartrA vinA janiH iyam na ca yukta rUpA ityAdi vacanAt yaTA bimba pratibimba mudrA pratimudrA Adi nyAyena kzaNika tvam na izyate BavadBiH taTA anyasya api BAvasya utpAda samanantara DvaMsinaH kzaNika tvam na yuktam yatas jAti jarA sTiti anitya tA AKyAni catvAri saMskRta lakzaNAni utpadyamAnasya BAvasya bAhyasya ADyAtmikasya vE ekasmin= eva kzaNe Ba tatra jAti jarayoH paraspara viroDAt sTiti anitya tayoH ca ekasmin= eva BAve na yugapad saMBavaH izyate sadBiH kzaNike sarvaTA aBAvAt kutas kAcid purANa tA sTEryAt akzaNike ca api kutas kAcid purANa tA yaTA antaH sti kzaNasya evamAdi maDyam ca kalpyatAm antaka tvAt kzaNasya evam na lokasya kzaNa sTitiH Adi maDya avasAnAni cintyAni kzaNa vat punar Adi maDya avasAna tvam na svatas paratas pi vA iti maDyamaka sidDAnta pAWAt kzaNika padArTa asidDeH asidDiH avaseyA na ca jAti maraNayoH paraspara Binna lakzaNayoH ekasmin kzaNe saMBavaH Bavet saMSaya niScaya jQAnayoH Aloka anDakArayoH jQAna ajQAnayoH bIja aFkurayoH maraNa Bava upapatti BavayoH Binna lakzaNayoH iti Adi vat paraspara nirapekzayoH eva sva hetu pratyaya sidDayoH sahaBAvaH yujyate savya itara go vizANayoH yuvati stanayoH nara karNayoH iti Adi vat na tu punar kadAcid api paraspara virudDayoH vinASa utpAdayoH yaTA uktam rAga rakta parIkzAyAm saha eva punar udBUtiH na yuktA rAga raktayoH BavetAm rAga raktO hi nirapekzO parasparam na ekatve sahaBAvaH sti na tena eva hi tat saha pRTaktve sahaBAvaH Ta kutas eva Bavizyati evam raktena rAgasya sidDiH na saha na asaha rAga vat sarva DarmANAm sidDiH na saha na asaha iti pratizeDAt kutas samAna kAlatA BAvAnAm maraNa Bava upapatti BavayoH iti atas sahaBAvaH vineya jana boDa column1: Ahosvit na BavizyAmi anAgate Dvani
column2: ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram /

column1: kaH nu BavizyAmi anAgate Dvani
column2: 'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur /

column1: kaTam nu BavizyAmi anAgate Dvani
column2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir 'gyur /

column1: pratyutpannam vA punar na pratisarati kim nu idam kaTam nu idam ke santaH ke BavizyAmaH ayam sattvaH kutam AgataH
column2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam du phyi ma'i mtha' la rten par mi byed do // 'di ci zhig /'di ji lta bu zhig / ci zhig / cir 'gyur / sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs //

column1: saH itas cyutaH kutra gamizyati iti yAni ekezAm SramaNa brAhmaNAnAm pRTak loke dRzwi gatAni
column2: de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes de ltar byung ba la yang rten par mi byed do // 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gi lta bar song ba gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste / bdag tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am / sems can du smra ba dang ldan pa'am / srog tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am / gang zag tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am /

column1: Bavizyanti tat yaTA Atma vAda pratisaMyuktAni jIva vAda pratisaMyuktAni kOtuka maFgala pratisaMyuktAni
column2: dge mtshan dang bkra shis su smra ba dang ldan pa dag kyang rung ste / lhag par g-yo ba dang bral bar g-yo ba de dag /

column1: tAni asya tasmin samaye prahINAni Bavanti parijQAtAni samucCinna mUlAni tAla mastaka vadana ABAsa gatAni AyatyAm anutpAda ani roDa DarmANi
column2: de'i tshe na des spang bar 'gyur te / yongs su shes nas / rtsa ba nas bcad de ta la'i mgo bzhin mi snang ba'i rang bzhin du / phyis mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro //

column1: aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH mEtreyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya BAzitam aBinandya anupramodya utTAya AsanAt prakrAntaH prakrAntAH te ca BikzavaH iti
column2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bshad pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang ste / stan las langs te dong ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // de'i phyir de ltar // gang gis thugs brtse nyer bzung nas // lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir // dam pa'i chos ni @198b bstan mdzad pa // goo ta ma de la phyag 'tshal lo // de la 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa spang ba dang 'thab pa'i dmigs pa'i g-yang sa las 'dzin pas na chos so // 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos te / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag zad par byed pa nyid kyis bsngags par 'os pa'i phyir ro // yang na chos bzang po ni dam pa'i chos te / dam pa'i chos rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'gag pa med pa / skye ba med pa / rtag pa med pa / chad pa med pa / 'ong ba med pa / 'gro ba med pa don tha dad pa ma yin pa / don gcig pa ma yin pa / spros pa nye bar zhi zhing zhi ba / gang gis 'gro ba rnams la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas te / rnyed pa dang bkur sti bzhed pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs pa bzhed pas ma yin gyi / thugs rje chen po kho na la brten nas / lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir bstan par 'gyur ba / ston pa bla na med pa zla med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo // mtshan ci zhig ce na / goo ta ma ste / drang srong goo ta ma'i rigs su 'khrungs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

column1: iti AcArya candra kIrti pAda uparacitAyAm prasanna padAyAm maDyamaka vRttO dRzwi parIkzA nAma saptaviMSatitamam prakaraNam samAptam
column2: slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba tshig gsal ba las / lta ba brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa'i nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o / // / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdo sde la sogs bden pa gnyis brten bstan pa rnam pa dgu // 'jig rten rnams kyi spyod ngor rgya cher gang zhig 'dir ni yang dag bsgrags gyur pa // der ni 'dod chags bsal bar bya phyir gsungs pas zhe sdang zad par byed mi 'gyur // zhe sdang bsal bar bya phyir gsungs pas kyang ni 'dod chags zad par byed 'gyur min // gang phyir nga rgyal sogs zad bya phyir gsungs pa des kyang dri ma gzhan mi 'joms // de phyir de ni chos khyab ma yin gsung de dag dang de dag don chen min // gti mug zad par bya phyir gsungs pa gang yin des ni nyon mongs ma lus 'joms // nyon mongs @199a * // mtha' dag gti mug la ni yang dag brten par rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad // gang phyir rten 'byung gti mug de zad byed par mthong ste de ni de nyid yin // de nyid bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis dbu ma'i lam du yang dag bsgrags par gyur // de ni thub pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin skur 'dod de ni stong pa nyid du brjod // sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs yin de ni rigs pa chen po yin no zhes kyang bsgrags / gang phyir yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan gyur pa // de phyir de'i gtam shin tu rgyas par thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras po blo bzang klu sgrub de yi gsung rab ji lta bar // gnas pa bzhin du mkhyen nas gus pas bstan bcos dbu mar gtso bo'i ngo bor bstan // skye bo gang gis rgyal pa'i bstan pa zab mo ma rtogs pa des rtogs phyir dang // gang dag thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung las gzhan du de nyid bstan par 'dod pa dang // blo gros ngan pa gzhan gang gsung rab rnam pa gzhan du 'chad par byed gyur pa / de dag kyang ni bzlog par bya phyir mtha' gnyis sel ba'i bstan bcos 'di mdzad do // klu sgrub sgra gcan 'dzin ni bzang po'i zhal snga nas bcos lhas kyang gsung rjes su // 'brangs pa sa de yi tshul lugs dus ni yun ring zhig tu gsal bar bstan par mdzad // de yi slob ma bstan bcos de la rnam par 'byed pas rnam nges blo ldan pa // rnams kyis kyang ni mu stegs ma lus pham byas thub mchog bstan pa yun ring bshad // dbu ni don du gnyer ba 'ongs la thugs rjes dbu ni bcad de stsal mdzad nas // bde ba can du rgyal ba'i sras po klu sgrub gshegs par gyur pa des mdzad pa'i // gzhung rnams dang ni de yi slob ma'i tshogs de dag kyang dus mang zhig na nyams par gyur // de nyid nyi ma nub pas deng sang gzhung lugs gsal po de ni gang na'ang med // de ltar 'jig rten phal cher rtog pas sbyar ba'i don tsam la ni mkhas gyur la// @199b dam pa'i lam las ring zhing rtog ge'i chang 'thungs pa yis myos pa dang // sangs rgyas gzhung lugs thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i de nyid bral zhing 'khrugs pa'i tshe // gang zhig skad cig tsam yang yid gnyis bsal nas stong nyid rtogs de skal bar ldan // dngos po'i 'ching bas nyer sbyar bstan bcos zhags pas dkris shing 'jigs pas bcad byas nas // dngos po'i ra bar mchongs te 'gro ba'i ri dags mkhas gang de ni chen po ste // de ltos brtsams pas bdag la yon tan 'di med deng sang mi mkhas gang yin pa // de ched kho nar de las gzhan pa'i bstan bcos 'joms pa'i 'grel 'di bdag gis byas // mdo sde kun las btus dang gtam bya rin chen phreng dang yang dag bstod pa dang // 'bad pas shin tu yun ring 'phags pa'i bstan bcos las bstan tshig ler byas de dang // rigs pa drug cu zhes bya rnam par 'thag bcas stong nyid bdun cu pa de dang // gang yang rtsod pa rnam par bzlog pa bkod pa de dag kyang ni mthong gyur zhing // brgya pa la sogs de dag dang ni de bzhin mdo sde zab mo rnam mang dang // sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa mthong nas legs ldan byed kyis legs bshad gang // gcig nas gcig tu brgyud las 'ongs dang bdag gis rnam par phye las rnyed pa gang // de dag bsdams te blo chen ldan rnams mgu bar bya phyir yang dag bstan pa yin // dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan rtog ge 'joms byed blo gsal rnams la tshig gi ni // 'od zer dag gis 'di na gnas don yang dag ma dkrugs dngos su gsal byed cing // 'grel pa cha gsal 'di yang byed pa'i zla ba grags ldan 'di deng shar ba yis // 'jig rten rnams kyi yid gnyis mun pa stug po dag dang lhan cig sel ba yin // lung dang rigs pa la brten 'grel pa bsdebs legs ma dkrugs tshig dang ldan pa 'di // blo bzang dad ldan rnams la nges par bsgrub par bya phyir gus par byas nas na // bdag gis @200a * // bsod nams stong pa nyid ltar yangs par gyur pa gang zhig bsags pa des // 'jig rten ma lus lha tshogs spangs nas spros kun chad pa'i go 'phang bgrod par shog / ston pa goo ta ma dang ni de'i chos la zhugs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag dang / rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs dang de dag gis gsungs chos la phyag 'tshal nas // sangs rgyas gsung mtha' yas la blta phyir lus can rnams kyi mig gyur dbu ma ni // gang gi thugs rje'i sgo nas mdzad pa'i klu sgrub de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //

bstan bcos dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba / slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba / mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba / ri mor bris pa'i ba drus las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so / // / gsung rab rgya mtsho bsrubs byung de nyid bdud rtsi'i snod // shes rab ces bya snang byed tshig gsal rin chen sgron // bsgyur las dge ba gang bsags de yis nyi ma grags // lta thibs spangs te spros bral mkha' la 'gro bar shog / kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus // rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'debs su / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge ba chen po / ma h'a su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur / phyis ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka ba ra / ma dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o / // / khungs rnams ji ltar grags bzhin phris // phyin chang skad gnyis 'byung srid na // 'grel pa sgra don bzhin bsgyur la //
